title: Housing Permitting Schema
description: This data specification provides a standard list of values for Natural Resource Sector permitting data realted to housing attributes to supplementing the core permit schema.

housing_dwelling_type.label: Housing dwelling type
housing_dwelling_type.description: The type of dwelling units being developed, e.g, Single-family, Multi-family, Secondary Unit, Other (optional).

housing_dwelling_type_code.label: Housing dwelling type code
housing_dwelling_type_code.description: The code for the type of dwelling units being developed.

housing_dwelling_capacity_ranges.label: Housing dwelling capacity ranges
housing_dwelling_capacity_ranges.description: The number of dwelling or units defined in ranges.

housing_dwelling_capacity.label: Housing dwelling capacity
housing_dwelling_capacity.description: The number of dwellings or units to be developed.

purpose_built_rental_ind.label: Purpose built rental indicator
purpose_built_rental_ind.description: Indicating whether the application corresponds to a  purpose built residential unit, property, or dwelling that is available for long term rent by tenants, i.e., Y, N, U.

indigenous_led_ind.label: Indigenous led indicator
indigenous_led_ind.description: A value indicating whether the application is led by Indigenous groups, i.e., Y, N, U.

social_housing_ind.label: Social housing indicator
social_housing_ind.description: A value indicating whether the application's purpose pertains to Social Housing, i.e., Y, N, U.

version.title: Housing Permitting Schema Version
version.description: Defines the version of the schema being represented
